mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT WRITER , TITLE , CONTENT , FILENAME , IP , HIT , POSTDATE , LASTMODIFIED FROM IMGBOARD ORDER BY HIT DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMGBOARD VALUES (IMGBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{filename}, #{ip}, #{hit}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
